com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model

Class AbstractUDPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model.AbstractUDPClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SServerCoach, SServerPlayer, SServerTrainer

    public abstract class AbstractUDPClient
extends Thread
    This is the class used to connect each player/trainer/coach to the server within their own threads.
    Author:
    Atan

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractUDPClient

        public AbstractUDPClient()
        Constructs an AbstractUDPClient with default parameters. This is for players, not coaches or trainers. Assumes localhost Assumes port 6000

      • AbstractUDPClient

        public AbstractUDPClient(int port)
        Constructs an AbstractUDPClient object given only the port number. This can be used for players, coaches or trainers. Assumes localhost.
        Parameters:
        port - Any valid port.

      • AbstractUDPClient

        public AbstractUDPClient(int port,
                 String hostname)
        Constructs an AbstractUDPClient object given the port number and hostname. This can be used for players, coaches or trainers.
        Parameters:
        port - Any valid port.
        hostname - Any valid hostname. (eg. 192.168.1.67 or RCSServerHost)
